item.description: Let the love pour in! DARK and Decadent started as our Valentines Day weekend kickoff to celebrate all good things. Chocolate, music, wine and your sweetie. Join us at the winery for a complimentary glass of DARK {Zinfandel+Petite Sirah port}, small bites and chocolates from Rhode Islands own Hauser Chocolatier! Enjoy good company and live music in the Barrel Room as you jump start your Valentines Day weekend- DARK + Decadent style. Tickets are Membership price $10/Non-members $15. Space is limited and often sells out.

group.name: New Haven Wine and Dining Meetup Group,

item.name: DARK & Decadent " Jonathan Edwards Wine & Chocolate Pairing"
